net.viktorc.pspp.core

Class ProcessManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.viktorc.pspp.core.ProcessManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ProcessManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A class for starting, managing, and interacting with processes. The process is started by calling the run method.
    Author:
    A6714

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int UNEXPECTED_TERMINATION_RESULT_CODE
      If the process cannot be started or an exception occurs which would make it impossible to retrieve the actual result code of the process.

      • ProcessManager

        public ProcessManager(java.lang.ProcessBuilder builder,
                      long keepAliveTime)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs a manager for the specified process without actually starting the process.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the process command is invalid.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Returns the 64 bit ID number of the instance.
        Returns:
        The ID of the instance.

      • executeCommand

        public boolean executeCommand(CommandSubmission commandSubmission)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Attempts to write the specified command followed by a new line to the standard in stream of the process and blocks until it is processed.
        Parameters:
        commandSubmission - The command to execute including a listener for new output lines.
        Returns:
        Whether the command was submitted for execution. If the manager is busy processing another command, it returns false; otherwise the command is submitted and true is returned once it's processed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the command cannot be written to the standard in stream.

         throws ProcessManagerException
